remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前，唯一 WMI 支援的格式是*Managed 物件格式*(MOF)。Currently, the only format that WMI supports is *Managed Object Format* (MOF). 未來，其他格式將會支援，例如可延伸標記語言 (XML)。In the future, other formats will be supported, such as Extensible Markup Language (XML). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例顯示的 MOF 程式碼**Win32_Process**類別使用方法。The following example displays the MOF code for the **Win32_Process** class by using the method. 如需有關**Win32_Process**類別，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about the **Win32_Process** class, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. span.span: Each element in the collection holds information such as the *qualifier* name, value, and *flavor*.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value A表示管理物件上定義的限定詞。A that represents the qualifiers defined on the management object. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性的值顯示**描述**中的屬性限定詞**Win32_Process**類別。The following example uses the property to display the value of the **Description** qualifier for each of the properties in the **Win32_Process** class. 如需有關**Win32_Process**類別，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on the **Win32_Process** class, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Management.PropertyDataCollection SystemProperties { get; }
.property instance class System.Management.PropertyDataCollection SystemProperties
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property SystemProperties As PropertyDataCollection
public: virtual property System::Management::PropertyDataCollection ^ SystemProperties { System::Management::PropertyDataCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得管理物件的 WMI 系統屬性集合 (例如，類別名稱、伺服器和命名空間)。

span.span: Gets the collection of WMI system properties of the management object (for example, the class name, server, and namespace).

summary.span: WMI 系統屬性名稱開頭為 "__"。

span.span: WMI system property names begin with "__".

value.span: 傳回，其中包含管理物件的系統屬性。

span.span: Returns a that contains the system properties for a management object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value A ，代表管理物件的系統屬性。A that represents the system properties of the management object. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性顯示的名稱和值的系統屬性**Win32_Process**類別。The following example uses the property to display the name and value of the system properties for the **Win32_Process** class. 如需有關**Win32_Process**類別，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information on the **Win32_Process** class, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
